articles.author: Erin Snodgrass, Katherine Tangalakis-Lippert
articles.title: DOJ warned Elon Musk about his $1 million voting sweepstakes in swing states: reports - Business Insider
articles.description: The Department of Justice warned Elon Musk's America PAC that the sweepstakes could violate federal law, reports say.
articles.content:
Elon Musk's efforts to mobilize swing-state voters via a $1 million sweepstakes have the US Department of Justice watching.
The agency recently sent a letter to Musk's America PAC warning that the c… [+2266 chars]
